title: Swami Vivekananda Jayanti Celebration
description: Annual celebration of Swami Vivekananda's birth anniversary with special prayers, bhajan and discourse on his teachings.

title: Sri Ramakrishna Paramhansa Puja
description: Special worship ceremony commemorating Sri Ramakrishna Paramhansa with devotional songs and spiritual discourses.

title: Youth Leadership Workshop
description: A three-day workshop focusing on character building and leadership development based on Swami Vivekananda's principles.

title: Meditation & Yoga Session
description: Weekly meditation and yoga sessions for spiritual wellness and mental peace. Open to all age groups.

title: Community Service Day
description: Monthly community service initiative including free health checkup, educational support and food distribution.

title: Bhagavad Gita Study Circle
description: Weekly study and discussion sessions on Bhagavad Gita teachings with experienced scholars.

title: Guru Purnima Celebration
description: Sacred festival honoring the Guru tradition with special puja, kirtan and prasad distribution.
